JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities      Test Engineers at Cloud Assert aren't expected to be a manual tester, you write scripts to automate testing and create tools so developers can test their own code   As a Test Engineer, you navigate codebase, identify weak spots and constantly design better and creative ways to break software and identify potential problems   Will own the quality of a feature, component or a product. Will write, execute and fix test cases, test scripts as per specifications and interact with Developers/Product Team to a report, troubleshoot and resolve issues   Managing and maintaining test coverage through periodic reports to engineering and stakeholders   Complete hands on contribution on Single or multiple projects simultaneously   Will need to understand the production environment and analyze data and server logs   Setting up and implementation of test automation strategy from Functional and Non-functional perspective for one or more modules   Find innovative ways to optimize the test strategy     Academic Qualification:   BE/MCA or advanced degree in Computer Science or equivalent    Experience:   5 to 10 Years     Skill Set  : Automation testing, DB Testing, API Testing, UI Testing and C# or Java (C# Preferred)        Requirements   Test Engineers at    expected to be a   you write scripts to automate testing and create tools so developers can test their own code    As a Test Engineer, you navigate codebase, identify weak spots and constantly design better and creative ways to break software and identify potential problems       Will own the quality of a feature, component or a product.
